EmailTemplate.name: Decoding Retail - eBook Phase.Send Email 4.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Shoppers' Recent Psychological Shift
EmailTemplate.textOnly: New psychological factors are shaping everything from how and where shoppers buy…to what they buy.By knowing more about your shoppers’ new mindsets and how they emotionally approach visits to {{company.Company Name:default=your store}}, you can uncover unexpected opportunities to build loyalty and succeed long-term.See the trends, psychological drivers, statistics and advice on everything from BOPIS to returns and more in our article. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
